flavorText: After a few painful experiences, goblins learned not to pick their noses around the beasts.

foreignData.flavorText: Nachdem es einige schmerzhafte Zwischenfälle gab, hatten die Goblins kapiert, dass man in der Nähe dieser Bestien besser nicht in der Nase bohren sollte.
foreignData.name: Gespornter Vielfraß
foreignData.text: Tappe zwei ungetappte Bestien, die du kontrollierst: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Después de algunas experiencias dolorosas, los trasgos aprendieron a no hurgarse la nariz cerca de las bestias.
foreignData.name: Glotón con espolones
foreignData.text: Girar dos Bestias enderezadas que controles: La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Après quelques expériences douloureuses, les gobelins ont appris à ne pas approcher les bêtes de trop près.
foreignData.name: Glouton à éperons
foreignData.text: Engagez deux bêtes dégagées que vous contrôlez : La créature ciblée acquiert l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Dopo alcune esperienze dolorose, i goblin hanno imparato a non mettersi le dita nel naso con queste bestie nei paraggi.
foreignData.name: Ghiottone Spronato
foreignData.text: TAPpa due Bestie STAPpate che controlli: Una creatura bersaglio guadagna attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Depois de umas quantas experiências dolorosas, os goblins aprenderam a não ficar fuçando perto das bestas.
foreignData.name: Carcaju Esporoado
foreignData.text: Vire duas Bestas desviradas que você controla: A criatura alvo ganha iniciativa até o final do turno.

name: Spurred Wolverine
originalText: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: Since the ability does not have the {T} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.
It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

text: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
